home.heroDescription: Find rental vehicles, discover busy areas with historic data, and unlock exclusive discounts on auto parts, maintenance, and services.
home.waitlistTitle: Join the Waitlist for Exclusive Discounts
home.waitlistDescription: Get early access to significant savings on:
home.waitlistSuccessDescription: Thank you for joining! We'll notify you when exclusive discounts become available.
home.waitlistErrorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
home.waitlistEmailError: Please enter a valid email address
home.waitlistPrivacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.
home.waitlistSubtext: Join thousands of TLC drivers already saving money. No commitment required.
home.feature1Description: Browse hundreds of TLC-plated vehicles available for rent. Filter by make, model, year, and mileage to find exactly what you need.
home.feature2Description: Maximize your earnings with our heat map showing high-demand areas based on historical Uber and Lyft trip data across NYC.
home.feature3Description: Have a spare car or TLC plate? List it in minutes and start earning passive income by renting to verified drivers.
home.feedbackDescription: Your feedback helps us build features that matter most to TLC drivers. Share your ideas and suggestions with us.
home.feedbackDisclaimer: We review all feedback and use it to improve TLC Shift for our community.
home.feedbackSuccessDescription: We appreciate your input and will consider your request.
home.feedbackWarningDescription: Tell us what you'd like to see in TLC Shift.
home.feedbackErrorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

listings.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this listing? This action cannot be undone.
listings.deleteSuccessDescription: Your listing has been successfully deleted.
listings.deleteErrorDescription: Failed to delete listing. Please try again.
listings.noListingsDescription: There are currently no listings available. Be the first to create one!

auth.passwordRequirements: Password must include at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number.
auth.passwordLength: Password length must be between 6 and 18 characters.

trips.loadingMessage: This may take up to 50 seconds.

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
account.planDescription: You are currently on the free plan
account.freeFeatureNote: You can create and manage listings at no cost. In the future, premium features may be available.

myListings.title: My Listings
myListings.noListingsTitle: You Don't Have Any Listings Yet
myListings.noListingsDescription: Start earning by listing your vehicle or TLC plate. It only takes a few minutes!

contactModal.title: Contact Information
contactModal.loginPrompt: Please sign in or create an account to view contact information

listingForm.title: Title
listingForm.errorTitleLength: Title must be at least 3 characters long.
listingForm.errorDescriptionLength: Description length must be more than 25 characters or less than 1000.
listingForm.errorEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
listingForm.errorPhoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number.
listingForm.errorImagesRequired: Please upload at least one photo.

imageUploader.errorMaxFiles: You can upload maximum {max} photos. You already have {current}.
imageUploader.errorMaxTotalSize: Maximum total size is {max}. Current: {current}. Attempted: {attempting}
